chapter_title.en: Lady Jia Dies in Yangzhou; Leng Zixing Describes the Rong-guo House
chapter_title.ru: Госпожа Цзя умирает в Янчжоу; Лэн Цзысин описывает Дом Жунго
chapter_title.ja: 賈夫人揚州城に仙逝し、冷子興栄国府を演説す

segments.original: [Continuing Leng Zixing's description of different types of people and their relation to wealth, virtue, and talent]
segments.zh_modern: [冷子兴继续描述不同类型的人及其与财富、美德和才能的关系]
segments.en: [Leng Zixing continues describing various character types and their relationships to wealth, virtue and talent]
segments.ru: [Лэн Цзысин продолжает описывать различные типы характеров и их отношение к богатству, добродетели и таланту]
segments.ja: [冷子興、異なる人物類型とそれらの富、徳、才能との関係を描写し続ける]

segments.zh_modern: [子兴与雨村关于贾府情况和特点的对话]

commentary.original: 闲又一个是见之文传，特与顽家鉴对，就可倒知奴。
commentary.zh_modern: 闲笔又写一个人物来作为对照，特别与顽劣之家对比，就可以反过来了解其性质。
commentary.en: Another character introduced for contrast, particularly compared with stubborn households, revealing their nature by inversion.
commentary.ru: Ещё один персонаж введён для контраста, особенно по сравнению с упрямыми семьями, раскрывая их природу инверсией.
commentary.ja: 閑また一個是れ見るの文伝、特に頑家と鑑対し、就ち可なり倒して奴を知る。

segments.original: [Discussion of family members and their characteristics]
segments.en: [Discussion of family members and their characteristics]
segments.ja: [家族成員とその特徴の議論]

commentary.en: Casual stroke as if recording for posterity
commentary.ru: Небрежный штрих, словно записывающий для потомков
commentary.ja: 閑にして其を閣するが如し

translator_notes: This page continues Leng Zixing's famous exposition about the Jia family, establishing key themes of the novel
The discussion introduces the concept of different types of people in relation to talent, virtue, and circumstances
The 甲戌本 commentary emphasizes the narrative technique of using contrast to reveal character
This expository dialogue serves to introduce readers to the complex family structure before the main narrative begins
research_notes: Reviewed scholarly analysis of Leng Zixing's role as expository narrator
Consulted 红楼梦人物论 for character classification systems
Referenced existing translations for handling of this expository section
